hero_section.paragraph: Our West Georgia Regional office is located in LaGrange, Georgia and proudly serves clients in Troup, Meriwether, Heard, Coweta, Talbot, Chattahoochee, Carroll, Muscogee, and Harris Counties.

about_section.title: About Our West Georgia Region
about_section.paragraph: Serving clients in beautiful LaGrange, Georgia, and all throughout the West Georgia Region, our Abide Home Care West Georgia Region team is dependable, reliable, and equipped to meet all of your home care needs. We put our heart into every client we serve, and it shows! The West Georgia Region is proud to be nationally recognized as an industry leader among Home Care providers as both a Provider of Choice and an Employer of Choice. One simple call is all you need in order to get started. Give us a call today!

about_section.paragraph: Serving clients in both the Griffin and greater Metro Atlanta areas, our Abide Home Care South Atlanta Metro Region team is dependable, reliable, and equipped to meet all of your home care needs. The comfort of our clients is at the heart of everything we do!
